signature: static String toLookupKey(final String left, final String separator, final String right)
name: toLookupKey

signature: protected String substringAfter(final String value, final String str)
name: substringAfter
javadoc:
/**
     * Returns the substring after the first occurrence of {@code str} in {@code value}.
     *
     * @param value The source string.
     * @param str The string to search.
     * @return a new string.
     * @deprecated Use {@link StringUtils#substringAfter(String, String)}.
     */

signature: protected String substringAfterLast(final String value, final char ch)
name: substringAfterLast
javadoc:
/**
     * Returns the substring after the first occurrence of {@code ch} in {@code value}.
     *
     * @param value The source string.
     * @param ch The character to search.
     * @return a new string.
     * @deprecated Use {@link StringUtils#substringAfterLast(String, int)}.
     */
